channel.title: Web on Shreyash Agarwal's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Shreyash Agarwal's Blog

item.title: Scraping web tables with requests and pandas
item.description: Hey everyone, It’s been a long time since I posted something, I’ve been busy with work and other things. I’ve written a lot of scrapes recently and while trying to reduce the code I would have to write, I stumbled upon something. Have you heard about Pandas?It’s a fantastic library which not only is useful for maintaining data structures in it’s famous Dataframe, but also helped me cut out BeautifulSoup (another awesome library which I used to use for web parsing) completely!
